Collect.name: collect
Collect.help: Collects geometry from all inputs into a single output.

Null.name: null
Null.help: Does nothing.  Use for graph layout.

Switch.name: switch
Switch.help: Switches between geometry inputs using an index value.

index.description: which incoming geometry input to pass on

preFlatten.description: flattens the input curves into the chosen workplane before triangulating

swap.description: input curve/polygon to use as the primary

swapSubject.description: the role of the primary polygon

OffsetCurve.name: offset 2d path
OffsetCurve.help: Offsets curves in the selected 2d plane.

preFlatten.description: flattens the input curves into the chosen workplane before triangulating
flattens the input curves into the chosen workplane before triangulating

library.description: Poly2Tri is faster and more stable; Triangle is experimental, but offers triangle refinement and smoothing

options: first curve is outline, other curves are holes

convexHull.description: make convex hull of incoming points

algorithm.description: triangulation algorithm - sweepline is most stable (in particular for smoothing)

refine.description: refine the mesh based on a max triangle area and min angle

smoothing.description: smooth triangle layout after triangulation (works best using sweepline algorithm)

internalPoints.description: extra internal points - force vertex creation at those points

AddAttribute.name: add attribute
AddAttribute.help: Adds attribute metadata to points, primitives or nodes.

value.description: accepts a single value or list (boolean, int, float, string)

GetAttribute.name: get attribute
GetAttribute.help: Extracts metadata by input type and tag.

defaultValue.description: value to add to list if attribute does not exist on geo

defaultVectorValue.description: value to add to a vector list if attribute does not exist on geo

defaultStringValue.description: value to add to a string list if attribute does not exist on geo

combineMeshes.description: combine all meshes into one (displays faster)

Copy2.name: copy using vectors
Copy2.help: Copies primitives based on lists of input transform vectors.

combineMeshes.description: combine all meshes into one (displays faster)

mode.description: Variations on up vector orientation, direction of rotation, and handedness/chirality

Iterator.name: iterator
Iterator.help: Used in conjunction with downstream loop and copy nodes with the same tag.

value.description: set or connect a value to be used when not looping (value will not be respected during loop)

tag.description: changes will not be respected during looping

Loop.name: loop
Loop.help: Repeats a section of the graph, accumulating geometry changes if so desired.

cumulative.description: feed result of a loop into the next loop, accumulating changes

combineMeshes.description: combine all meshes into one (displays faster)

Circle.name: circle
Circle.help: Creates a circle of selected type.

Plane.name: rectangle
Plane.help: Creates a rectangular plane of selected type along the selected axis.

initializationList.description: connect a vector list and initialize to push the vectors as point positions

outputPolymesh.description: output a PolyMesh primitive (vertices only), instead of a PointsPrimitive

selection.description: bitmask of which points are selected

PolyCylinder.name: cylinder
PolyCylinder.help: Creates a cylinder between two vector positions.

PolySphere.name: sphere
PolySphere.help: Creates a mesh sphere at vector positions.

Tetrahedron.name: tetrahedron
Tetrahedron.help: Creates a tetrahedron mesh at vector positions.

deprecated.deprecationHelpString: Primitives in this node are incorrectly sized and not positioned at world origin.

TetrahedronV2.name: tetrahedron
TetrahedronV2.help: Creates a tetrahedron mesh at vector positions.

retrieveOnGraphLoad.description: Loads the referenced graph asset on load of this graph.

parameters.description: parameters as JSON string containing key-value pairs

assetURI.description: uri of the referenced graph asset

assetName.description: name of the referenced graph asset

parameters.description: the graph's parameters as JSON string containing key-value pairs

retrieveOnGraphLoad.description: Loads the geometry asset on load of the graph.

useGroups.description: output each group in an OBJ file as a separate primitive

assetName.description: name of the referenced geometry asset

ImageAsset.name: image asset
ImageAsset.help: Imports an image for use with materials.

retrieveOnGraphLoad.description: Loads the image asset on load of the graph.

assetURI.description: uri of the referenced image asset

assetName.description: name of the referenced image asset

SetMaterial.name: material
SetMaterial.help: Sets the material properties of primitives.

mask.description: Boolean list indicating which primitives to apply the material to.

albedoTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

opacityTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

roughnessTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

metallicTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

reflectanceTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

bumpTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

emissionTexture.description: Image texture url(s) (or connect the url output of an image texture node).

doubleSided.description: Whether to render one or both sides of surfaces.

SetColor.name: set color
SetColor.help: Sets the color and alpha of primitives.

color.description: connect a list to set color per-primitive

alpha.description: if < 1, the material becomes transparent (and one-sided, so you might have to flip normals)

edgeColor.description: connect a list to set edge color per-primitive

edgeAlpha.description: connect a list to set edge alpha per-primitive

mask.description: connect a boolean list to only set colors on some primitives

ClosestPointOnCurve.name: closest point on curve
ClosestPointOnCurve.help: Finds the closest point on a input curve to input points.

geometry.description: curves to find closest point on

u coordinates.description: curve u value at closest positions

ClosestPointsToPoints.name: closest points to points
ClosestPointsToPoints.help: Finds the closest target points to source points.

sourcePoints.description: find closest points to these points amongst the target points

targetPoints.description: find closest points to source points amongst these points

calculateDistances.description: calculate distances from source points to their nearest target points

points.description: closest points to source points amongst target points

distances.description: distances from source points to their nearest target points

Normals.name: normals
Normals.help: Calculates and displays the normals, tangents and binormals of primitives.

mode.description: each vector is paired with a point, so a basis will output 3 vectors and 3 (!) points per incoming point

NumPoints.name: # points
NumPoints.help: Calculates the point count of input primitives.

NumPrimitives.name: # primitives
NumPrimitives.help: Calculates the number of input primitives.

PolyArea.name: mesh area
PolyArea.help: Calculates the area of mesh triangles.

total area.description: total area of all triangles & meshes

PolyCentroids.name: triangle centroids
PolyCentroids.help: Calculates the center of input triangles.

ExtrudeCurve.name: extrude curve
ExtrudeCurve.help: Extrudes curves in a vector direction.

InsertKnot.name: insert knot
InsertKnot.help: Inserts a control point on a curve.

JoinCurves.name: join curves
JoinCurves.help: Joins curve ends using a distance threshold.

tolerance.description: max distance between end points for curves to join

deleteLastPoint.description: deletes the last point of every joined curve

PointsToCurve.name: points to curve
PointsToCurve.help: Creates a curve using input points.

SimplifyCurve.name: simplify curve
SimplifyCurve.help: Simplifies inputs curves using a angle threshold.

angleThreshold.description: angle between line segments above which to discard of the point connecting the line segments

SplitCurve.name: split curve
SplitCurve.help: Splits curves into parts, or extracts splitting points.

outputSplitPoints.description: do not output split curves, but rather the split points

TesselateCurve.name: curve to polyline
TesselateCurve.help: Subdivides a curve into a polyline (a curve of order 2).

mode.description: 'approx segment length' scales the length by the nearest value that creates even length segments while preserving the end point (end point is not preserved with hard segment length)

perSegment.description: Polyline (order 2 curves) only: divide per polyline segment (preserves original point positions).

curve lengths.description: list of curve lengths (1 per input curve)

UnrollCurve.name: unroll curve
UnrollCurve.help: Unrolls each curve along x axis.

CombineMeshes.name: combine meshes
CombineMeshes.help: Combines meshes into a single mesh.

MeshBoundary.name: mesh boundary
MeshBoundary.help: Creates polyline curves around all mesh boundaries.

PolyClean.name: clean mesh
PolyClean.help: Attempts to clean up mesh geometry.

deleteZeroArea.description: delete triangles with area below threshold

deleteOrphanVertices.description: delete vertices not associated with any triangles

UnweldVertices.name: unweld vertices
UnweldVertices.help: Splits shared triangle vertices on meshes.

WeldVertices.name: weld vertices
WeldVertices.help: Welds overlapping mesh triangle edges based on an angle threshold.

radius.description: Weld vertices within this radius of each other.

angleThreshold.description: min angle between adjacent mesh triangles for welding to occur

nukeZeroAreaTris.description: after weld, delete zero area triangles (often created by the weld)

nukeOrphans.description: after weld, delete vertices not associated with any triangles

mask.description: (boolean list) if connected, only weld vertices with mask set to true

DeletePoints.name: delete points
DeletePoints.help: Deletes points using a mask or index list.

mask.description: a bit mask of points to delete

indexList.description: points with these indices will be deleted

ExtractPoints.name: get points
ExtractPoints.help: Gets the points of input primitives using a mask.

SetPoints.name: set points
SetPoints.help: Sets the position of points using x,y,z values.

DeletePrimitives.name: delete primitives
DeletePrimitives.help: Deletes primitives using a mask or index list.

mask.description: a bit mask of primitives to delete

indexList.description: primitives with these indices will be deleted

index.description: get primitive with this index from incoming list of primitives 9list of indices also allowed)

ExtractCurve.name: curve from surface
ExtractCurve.help: Extracts a curve from a NURBS surface using U or V values.

uvParameter.description: The U or V location to extract the curve from.

extractU.description: If true, use the surface's U coordinate for the curve's location.  If false, use V.

Skin.name: loft
Skin.help: Creates a surface by lofting curves.

per.description: How many curves per loft (0 to loft all).

orderU.description: The NURBS order of the surface perpendicular to the input curves.

meshSmoothness.description: Amount of subdivision along direction of input curves of order > 2.

weld.description: Weld the result of the loft.

SplitPatch.name: split surface
SplitPatch.help: Splits NURBS surfaces along a U or V value.

Align.name: align
Align.help: Aligns input geometries to each other.

mode.description: treat every geometry connection as a group, or work with the primitive soup (there might be multiple primitives per connection)

policyForFirst.description: what to do with the first primitive/connection

Mirror.name: mirror
Mirror.help: Mirrors geometry across a selected axis.

size.description: intended size along the specified axis

resetSize.description: sets the size to the size of the incoming geometry (only if size has no incoming connection)

preserveMin.description: proportion (0 to 1) of lower coordinate range to 'freeze'

preserveMax.description: proportion (0 to 1) of upper coordinate range to 'freeze'

defaultU.description: U value to output when none found on a point.

defaultV.description: V value to output when none found on a point.

FlipUV.name: flip UV
FlipUV.help: Swaps or flips UV values of NURBS surfaces. Reverses curves (flip U).

mask.description: A bit mask of primitives to delete.

ProjectUV.name: project UV
ProjectUV.help: Creates UV coordinates on a mesh by projecting along an axis.

ListLength.name: list length
ListLength.help: Calculates the number of items in a list.

length minus one.description: length of the list, minus one

ClampedList.name: clamped number list
ClampedList.help: Creates a clamped and spaced number list.

spaceBorders.description: if true space is added between edge values and min or max

ClosestValue.name: closest value
ClosestValue.help: Finds closest value in number list.

sourceValues.description: find closest values to these values amongst the target values

targetValues.description: find closest values to source values amongst these values

value.description: closest value if no source list provided

deltas.description: value difference between source values to their nearest target values

CullList.name: cull number list
CullList.help: Cull a number list using a mask.

GetListItem.name: get number list item
GetListItem.help: Gets the value of an item in a number list.

index.description: an index, or list of indices

MatchNumberLists.name: match number lists
MatchNumberLists.help: Returns two lists of booleans, one for each input list (same length) - items are true if the number at their index is found in the other list.

list1 matches.description: list of booleans: true if number at this index in list 1 was found in list 2

list2 matches.description: list of booleans: true if number at this index in list 2 was found in list 1

SetListItem.name: set number list item
SetListItem.help: Sets an items value in a number list.

SetListItems.name: set number list items
SetListItems.help: Sets multiple item values in a number list.

ShiftList.name: shift number list
ShiftList.help: Shifts the items of a number list.

ShuffleList.name: shuffle number list
ShuffleList.help: Shuffles the items of a number list.

SortFloatList.name: sort number list
SortFloatList.help: Sorts the values of a number list.

value.description: return the closest value to this one, above and below in the list

original indexes.description: map from new to old indices

reverse indexes.description: map from old to new indices

value below.description: value in the list closest below given value

value above.description: value in the list closest above given value

below index.description: index in the original list, of the 'below' value;  -1 if value < lowest list value

above index.description: index in the original list, of the 'below' value;  -1 if value > highest list value

CullStringList.name: cull string list
CullStringList.help: Culls a string list using a mask.

FindInStringList.name: find in string list
FindInStringList.help: Searches for a string in string list.

indexOffset.description: offset output indices by this value

found.description: this value is true if the search string has been found

first hit index.description: index (with offset) of the first search hit

all hit indices.description: list of indices (with offset) of search hits

GetStringListItem.name: get string list item
GetStringListItem.help: Gets a string from string list using an index value.

index.description: an index, or list of indices

SetStringListItem.name: set string list item
SetStringListItem.help: Sets a string's value in a string list.

StringListToString.name: string list to string
StringListToString.help: Concatenates a string list to a string.

CullVectorList.name: cull vector list
CullVectorList.help: Culls a vector list using a mask.

GetVectorListItem.name: get vector list item
GetVectorListItem.help: Gets a vector item from a vector list using an index value.

index.description: an index, or list of indices

SetVectorListItem.name: set vector list item
SetVectorListItem.help: Sets the value of a vector in a vector list.

SetVectorListItems.name: set vector list items
SetVectorListItems.help: Sets the values of vectors in a vector list.

ExpressionParser.name: expression
ExpressionParser.help: Calculates the results of the written expression.

expression.description: +, -, *, /, \, %, >, <, =>, =<, ==, =!, &&, ||, &, |, =^, **, ?:, min, max, sin, cos, tan, asin, acos, atan, atan2, sinh, cosh, tanh, round, ceil, floor, trunc, sqrt, pow, exp, log, log10, abs, sign

deprecated.deprecationHelpString: This is a duplicate of the expression node, and is now unneeded.

Formula.name: formula
Formula.help: Calculates the results of the written expression.

expression.description: +, -, *, /, \, %, >, <, =>, =<, ==, =!, &&, ||, &, |, =^, **, ?:, min, max, sin, cos, tan, asin, acos, atan, atan2, sinh, cosh, tanh, round, ceil, floor, trunc, sqrt, pow, exp, log, log10, abs, sign

formula.description: This input is unused by the engine. Clients may wish to store unparsed expressions here.

Abs.name: absolute value
Abs.help: Takes the absolute of a value.

Divide.name: divide
Divide.help: Divides a value by another value.

Modulo.name: modulo
Modulo.help: Finds the remainder of a value divided by another value.

Power.name: power
Power.help: Calculates a value to the power of another value.

SquareRoot.name: square root
SquareRoot.help: Calculates the square root of a value.

Subtract.name: subtract
Subtract.help: Subtracts a value from another value.

Clamp.name: clamp
Clamp.help: Clamps a value between a minimum and a maximum.

Max.name: maximum
Max.help: Finds the maximum value amongst inputs.

Min.name: minimum
Min.help: Finds the minimum value amongst inputs.

Greater.name: greater
Greater.help: Checks whether a value is greater than another value.

Less.name: less
Less.help: Checks whether a value is less than another value.

And.name: and
And.help: Checks whether all inputs are true.

Or.name: or
Or.help: Checks whether any of the input values are true.

Ease.name: ease
Ease.help: Performs an ease function on 0->1 input values.

Range.name: range
Range.help: Remaps values of a given range to a new range.

SimplexNoise.name: noise
SimplexNoise.help: Outputs a simplex noise based on input points.

Ceiling.name: ceiling
Ceiling.help: Rounds up to the nearest integer.

Floor.name: floor
Floor.help: Rounds down to the nearest integer.

FloatSwitch.name: number switch
FloatSwitch.help: Switches between number inputs using an index.

StringSwitch.name: string switch
StringSwitch.help: Switches between string inputs using an index.

VectorSwitch.name: vector switch
VectorSwitch.help: Switches between vector inputs using an index.

Acos.name: arc cosine
Acos.help: Performs an arc cosine function on a value.

Asin.name: arc sine
Asin.help: Performs an arc sine function on a value.

Atan.name: arc tangent
Atan.help: Performs an arc tangent function on a value.

Atan2.name: arc tangent 2
Atan2.help: Performs an arc tangent2 function of two values (x an y).

Cos.name: cosine
Cos.help: Performs a cosine function on a value.

Sin.name: sine
Sin.help: Performs a sine function on a value.

Tan.name: tangent
Tan.help: Performs a tangent function on a value.

AngleBetween.name: angle between
AngleBetween.help: Finds the (smallest) angle between two vectors.

Cross.name: cross product
Cross.help: Performs the cross product of two vectors.

Dot.name: dot product
Dot.help: Performs the dot product of two vectors.

Magnitude.name: vector magnitude
Magnitude.help: Finds the magnitude (length/size) of a vector.

squareMagnitude.description: do not take square root after squaring values (faster)

MultiplyVector.name: multiply vector
MultiplyVector.help: Multiplies vectors by factor values and/or with other vectors.

VectorToXYZ.name: vector to xyz
VectorToXYZ.help: Splits a vector into its x, y and z components.

XYZToVector.name: xyz to vector
XYZToVector.help: Creates a vector from x, y and z components.

Ephemeral.name: ephemeral state
Ephemeral.help: Outputs the ephemeral state of the graph. This state is set programmatically.

Error.name: error check
Error.help: Checks whether an input node is errored.

message.description: error message to output (leave empty to use input node's error message)

BooleanList.name: boolean list
BooleanList.help: Creates a list of boolean values.

ColorValue.name: color
ColorValue.help: Creates an rgb color value. The default range for the rgb components is 0 to 1.

EnumValue.name: choice
EnumValue.help: Creates a enumeration (choice) parameter, typically shown as a dropdown UI element.

indexOffset.description: offset output index by this value

defaultValue.description: choice option index to use when the value is reset

FloatValue.name: number
FloatValue.help: Creates a floating point number (double precision).

defaultValue.description: Value to output when the value is set to default, or when the input value is null.

minMaxMode.description: Soft: values outside of slider range allowed.  Hard: min/max respected at all times.

inputIsNull.description: Is true when the node's input is set to null.

FloatList.name: number list
FloatList.help: Creates a list of (double precision) floating point number values.

defaultValue.description: Value to output when the value is set to default, or when the input value is null.

minMaxMode.description: Soft: values outside of slider range allowed.  Hard: min/max respected at all times.

inputIsNull.description: Is true when the node's input is set to null.

IntegerList.name: integer list
IntegerList.help: Creates a list of integer number values.

StringList.name: string list
StringList.help: Creates a list of string (text) values.

VectorValue.name: vector
VectorValue.help: Creates a 3 component xyz vector value.

VectorList.name: vector list
VectorList.help: Creates a list of 3 component xyz vector values.

CombineData.name: combine data
CombineData.help: Combine incoming data into a list of data.

input1.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input2.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input3.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input4.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input5.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input6.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input7.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

input8.description: Can be any type of data input.  Will be ignored if not connected.

mode.description:
Preserve: keep list nesting.
Expand: unpack lists (one level).
Expand recursively: unpack lists recursively into a single unnested list.

JsonBuilder.name: JSON builder
JsonBuilder.help: Creates an array or a dictionary, and serializes it to JSON.

keys.description: List of dictionary keys. List length must be the same as the values list.

values.description: List of values. In dictionary mode, its length must be the same as the keys list.

json.description: the array, or dictionary, as a JSON string
